title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
th the door to have the following dialogue options.

What happened last time you opened? Come on, open up! No time to chat. I'm here to kill the hag.

Choosing dialogue 1 will show you images of the last time the gnarled door opened up for someone, what the hag did to that person who wished to go through. This will give you the following dialogue options.

I'm not afraid of that hag. I have to get through. Now. Leave.

Choose dialogue 3 and equip the mask to go through the door. quickly unequip
